sentences.en: Berserk: Now clears the cooldown on Mangle Bear.

sentences.en: His body was crushed and mangled beyond recognition.

sentences.en: I mangle their faces, till no features remain.

sentences.en: New shoes don't cut, blister, or mangle his feet.

sentences.en: Our products are mercirizing machine, continuous mangle & dyeing machine , printing machine , loop steamer, stenter and dryer.

sentences.en: There is almost no phrase so simple that he cannot mangle it.

sentences.en: They don't know what they're talking about and mangle scientific information.

words.tran_cn: 轧布者；绞肉机；乱砍者；压延机

trans.tran_cn: 乱砍, 撕裂, 破坏, 毁损, 损坏, 轧布
trans.tran_en: If a physical object is mangled, it is crushed or twisted very forcefully, so that it is difficult to see what its original shape was

trans.tran_cn: 乱砍，损坏，用轧布机砑光
